lines.text: Stay away from the moors, Stephen.
I can't. You know I can't!
I read somewhere that something isn't real until it passes through our imagination.
I'm 25. I've lived with my husband for four years, so I must be married.
There is within us all a terrible violence.
I wish it hadn't been you that found the body.
Jam sandwiches. situations like this always call for jam sandwiches.
